title: Not-So-Wicked Witch
description: Minecraft: Diary of a Not-So-Wicked Witch (Minecraft Story, Minecraft Books, Minecraft Books for Kids)    Read this Minecraft book FREE as part of your Amazon Prime or Kindle Unlimited membership    Enter the Life of a Minecraft Witch!   In this Minecraft diary, learn about Sandy the witch. She undergoes a transformation into a witch and her whole life changes completely. Learn about what happened to Sandy and how life as a witch treats her.  *This is an older book that was recently removed from the listings, but now it is back*  Disclaimer: This book is a work of fanfiction; it is not an official Minecraft book.
